CGmapTools
==========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which CGmapTools installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using CGmapTools, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load CGmapTools/0.1.2-intel-2019b
```
